attributes.action: Admit that his arrogance regarding the overwhelming response to the road pricing petition proves that this petitioning system is nothing but a sham.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Tony Blair has been consistently arrogant regarding matters of concern to the British electorate. His latest out of hand rejection of the petition calling upon him to scrap the road pricing plans underlines his lack of concern for the opinions of the general public.
This is a major issue for the majority of people in the UK and the government should be actively supporting major research into less/non polluting forms of transport not making it too expensive for the masses to enjoy personal travel.
The people of Britain have suffered enough at the hands of this government and this “Petition facility” is a demonstration of the disdain with which the public are treated.
Tony Blair or his cabinet colleagues have no intention of allowing the opinions of the signatories to influence their thinking because in their opinion “They know best”.
So come on Mr Blair, admit it, THIS SITE IS A SHAM!

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
